glsa.title: OpenSC: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: Multiple stack-based buffer overflows have been found in OpenSC, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: OpenSC is a tools and libraries for smart cards.

description.p: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow errors have been discovered in OpenSC.

impact.p: A physically proximate attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code using a specially crafted smart card.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All OpenSC users should upgrade to the latest version:
Packages which depend on this library may need to be recompiled. Tools such as revdep-rebuild may assist in identifying some of these packages.
